title: Script font, semi-connected, informal
content:
Hello fonty friends! I'm recreating some artwork provided by a client and identifying this font would be a great help. I think there are at least three - maybe four - different fonts here, but my main concern is the one for 'Debbie's". (I'm curious about "Hours" too, but I can do that in another post.)

I have checked Identifont, What the Font, and Bowfin Printworks (lovely site!). I also went through several other resources with no luck. A larger-resolution file is attached.

This is my first post but I'm looking forward to being a part of the community. Thank you in advance for your help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317053401im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_check_forum_sm_4303.jpg)

Font: 

 Remachine Script 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317053401/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font\_check\_forum.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317053401/http:/typophile.com/files/font_check_forum.jpg) | 1.3 MB |
author: amybyd

comments.content:
Debbie's: [Remachine Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317053401/http:/www.aringtypeface.com/remachine-script) by Måns Grebäck  
on: may be [Helvetica Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317053401/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-helvetica) Condensed  
Hours: [Southern Aire](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317053401/http:/www.aringtypeface.com/southern-aire) by Måns Grebäck  
6 am to 3pm: [Gillies Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317053401/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/gillies+gothic) or [Airstream NF](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317053401/http:/www.dafont.com/airstream.font)  
Open 1 days A Week: handwritten ;)
Wow, thank you so much for the thorough analysis as well as the direct links! I see the handwritten one didn't fool you one bit. :D Thanks again!
